aidAlAdha.title: Eid Al-Adha
aidAlAdha.subtitle: Celebrate Eid by sharing joy with families in Gaza. Choose to donate: a sheep for €250, a whole calf for €1850, or a seventh of a calf for €260. Your gift helps provide sacrificial animals, bringing warmth and happiness to those in need.

sosGaza.title: Gaza Emergency
sosGaza.subtitle: The people of Gaza are living under constant bombardment and humanitarian suffering. Your urgent support provides food, medical aid, and essential supplies to affected families.

zakatAlMaal.title: Zakat Al-Maal
zakatAlMaal.subtitle: Fulfill your religious duty and help improve lives. Zakat Al-Maal, one of Islam’s five pillars, requires paying 2.5% of savings above the nisab threshold. Your zakat supports critical relief efforts and sustainable development projects.

orphanSponsorship.title: Orphan Sponsorship
orphanSponsorship.subtitle: Make a lasting impact on a child's life. Sponsor an orphan to provide them with food, education, healthcare, and a sense of belonging.

waterForGaza.title: Clean Water for Gaza
waterForGaza.subtitle: In Gaza, over 90% of tap water is undrinkable due to high salinity and pollution. Groundwater contamination exceeds 96%. Help us provide clean and safe water — a lifeline for many families.

ramadan2025.title: Ramadan 2025
ramadan2025.subtitle: Make this Ramadan a season of giving. Help provide iftar meals and food baskets to families in need, and bring joy to their hearts during the holy month. Your donation makes a real difference.
